headline: 'Killed in front of our eyes': How the Pakistan train hijacking unfolded
description: Passengers tell the BBC of the 30-hour siege and their escape.

headline: Duterte's first night in ICC custody is a pivotal moment for the court
description: Duterte's arrest sends a strong signal that even powerful individuals may be held accountable for their actions.

headline: Actor arrested for evading conscription begins military service
description: Darren Wang allegedly used forged medical documents to try to get a military service exemption.

headline: Hotpot chain compensates diners after teenagers urinate in soup
description: A video of two teens urinating into the broth in a Shanghai outlet is being shared widely online.

headline: India arrests crypto administrator with Russia links wanted by US
description: Aleksej Besciokov is wanted by the US for allegedly laundering money and violating sanctions.

headline: US influencer draws backlash for stealing baby wombat from mum
description: Australia's PM Anthony Albanese suggests she tries it with a crocodile: "See how you go there".

headline: US tariffs on India will be a bitter pill to swallow
description: Nearly half of all medicines consumed in the US come from India. Tariffs will make them expensive.
